sentences.sContent: The situation is complicated by the fact that I’ve got to work late on Friday.
sentences.sCn: 我周五还得加班，这样一来事情更复杂了。

synos.tran: 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入

remMethod.val: com (全部) + plic (重叠) + ate → 全部重叠起来 → (使) 变复杂

words.tran: 并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱

trans.tranOther: to make a problem or situation more difficult
